text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea geniculata is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Borneo.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea geniculata". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33414A9781733. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33414A9781733.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
